name: Smeltdown!
description:
Welcome to the world of Alluria.  Not everyone can be a hero, some just make the weapons!  Become a blacksmith in a fantasy world, mine and forge to commercial success.  Will you be the blacksmith to the heroes of myth or will you have a smeltdown from the realities of retail work!

Join our community discord:  https://discord.gg/alluris
